Content-Type: text/plain;

Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

"Okay." Sinister said lamely. He walked off with Blizzard whenever Blizzard=
 walks off.

Sinesis sighs.

"I always said I never made any mistakes. That=
 I was perfect, but once, I was supposed to fight some criminals that had a=
 bounty on them, but I was not to harm anyone else. I killed that criminal =
for my own selfish needs, but he had a time bomb set. I thoguht I could dis=
arm it, but all I did was set the time even lower, and some bots didn't hav=
e time to get away. I managed to get away since I knew about it, but I neve=
r told them, so that's why I chose the evil path in life, I felt I had done=
 something evil..." Sinesis said...
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From:=
 ilovealllizards 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Saturday, August 05, 20=
00 5:24 AM
  Subject: Re: The End is Near...........


  Twister/Blizzard

=

  Twister: I was sent on a mission to stop another bot named Retroflame. S=
he planed to blow up some other bots that didn't know a thing because she c=
laimed that they were in her way. I was given no partners for there were no=
ne to give. I didn't stop them....I tried but I was shelfish and excaped in=
 a pod thinking of only myself and other bots were killed not only because =
of Retroflame but also because of me....I deserved to be near that bomb....=
.There were missions before that but I wish not speak of for I have failed =
too many.......I wouldn't kill myself for I would probably be sent back dow=
n for the Matrix would not want my selfish kind in.......

  *Twister says =
to Sinesis*


  *Blizzard sighs and looks up again still frowning*

  Blizz=
ard: We need to find shelter, my love.

  *Blizzard says to Sinister*

    =
----- Original Message ----- 
    From: THECODE 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com=
 
    Sent: Saturday, August 05, 2000 3:30 AM
    Subject: Re: The End is N=
ear...........


    Sinesis walks to Twister.

    "A failure? When were y=
ou a failure? Tell me of one of your adventures on Cybertron that was a fai=
lure." Sinesis said. Sinister shook his head.

    "Unbelievable." Sinister=
 said. Stronghold and Blender look at eahc other. They laugh at Plintissa a=
nd Dracona's misfortune and take a smoke, then walk off to find another sid=
e to join, all the time hoping that Artist suffers and hoping that Twister =
really is and always will be a failure...
      ----- Original Message ----=
- 
      From: ilovealllizards 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: S=
aturday, August 05, 2000 3:22 AM
      Subject: Re: The End is Near........=
...


      Twister/Blizzard


      *Twister looks at what was left of the=
 base*

      Twister: I always be nothing but a failer with nowhere to go.=
..

      *Twister walks next to the pieces of the base sits down staring a=
t the ground*


      *Blizzard frowns and a mech tear runs out of her opti=
c*

      Blizzard: I'll never have a place to stay that I can actually cal=
l home.....

      *Blizzard lowers her head and sighs*

        ----- Orig=
inal Message ----- 
        From: THECODE 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
=
        Sent: Saturday, August 05, 2000 3:10 AM
        Subject: The End is=
 Near...........


        Dracona looked into the pit. Plintissa wasn't mo=
ving. Dracona smiled and walked back toward her base. A dagger flew into Dr=
acona's back. She spun around and grabbed the dagger in pain. Plintissa sto=
od there.

        "You do not know when to give up, you fool, but never mi=
nd that your an idiot, I'm going to grind you so small you won't be able to=
 be seen with a microscope!" Dracona said. She kept her hand covered and fl=
ung the dagger back. It missed Plintissa and hit Artist in the leg. Dracona=
 smiled in satisfaction. Plintissa tackled Dacona and took her down. Dracon=
a once again turned to her saw blade to saw into Plintissa. Dracona fired a=
n ice beam, but Plintissa dodged. Dracona started to burn everything with f=
ire beams. Plintissa still avoids it. Plintissa was always a good fighter, =
but it wasn't until now, after her bad life that she discovered her true fi=
ghting power. Plintissa beat Dracona mercilessly. Draocona's parts were flu=
ng everywhere as Plintissa spun a simple stick through the air. Dracona rai=
sed the saw blade and sliced the stick to pieces. Dracona laughed and slice=
d Plintissa several hundred times. Plintissa fell.

        "Th weak move a=
side and die so the strong can survive. As ancient as the Cosmos, that has =
always been the way of things. I'm sorry Plintissa, you were a good friend,=
 but don't take this personally, it's just business." Dracona said.
       =
  
        Dracona pulled back the saw blade and thrust it towards Plintiss=
a. Plintissa grabbed her arm from earlier and threw it. It hit Dracona's bl=
ade. Dracona slammed it into Plintissa, but as she did, the blade came loos=
e before it hit Plintissa. The blade flew up. Dracona blinked her eye, the =
one Dinobot had scarred when she first arived on the planet. The blade sawe=
d through Dracona and left her in pieces everywhere. Her spark extinguished=
. Her last words were:

        "*Cough, Cough* Zardus I am sorry. Plintiss=
a, do not forget your promise." And Dracona died smiling. Plintissa remembe=
red that she promised Dracona that she would never leave her sitting. Plint=
issa cried. Her mech fluid ran everywhere and she got weaker and weaker. Ar=
tist stepped slowly over to Plintissa. He was crying, too.

        "Artist=
, I'm sorry it had to end this way." Plintissa whispered.

        "Why are=
 you leaving me, Plintissa? Why does everyone betray me?" Artist asked.

  =
      "Artist, there floats Dracona's spark, recover it, we can't part, she=
 really was my friend." Artist walked up and captured the extinguished spar=
k as it tried to fly away. He contained it in a capsule.

        "Plintiss=
a, if you leave me, I'll...have no more reason to live, all my friends are =
gone, my helping days are over." Artist said.

        "Your helping days a=
re never over, and we'll always be together." Plintissa said.

        "Thi=
s isn't some lame thing about how you'll always be in my heart, is it?"

  =
      "No, Artist, come here." Plintissa whispered. Artist looked at Team U=
ltima's base. It was destroyed, the funny thing was, that it was destroyed =
by Dracona, the very one, along with Plintissa, that originally built it. A=
nd there it was, sticking above ground now and burning away. Sinesis looks =
at the base and sighs.

        "Twister, Dracona is dead, I guess we have =
to leave." Sinesis says. Sinister stands next to Blizzard and sighs.

     =
   "Blizzard, we need to find another home, now." Sinister said sadly.

   =
     Artist came closer to Plintissa. Her spark suddenly burst from her and=
 floated into Artist's hands. She said to him what he needed to do. He open=
ed his chest compartment and his spark was revealed. Artist combined Plinti=
ssa's spark with his own, they became one.

        "Till all are one." Art=
ist whispered really low. Plintissa told him she still loved him. Artist wa=
s overjoyed! Plintissa was with him now, and now they could never be sepera=
ted again. Artist, completely ignoring Blizzard and Sinister, and Sinesis a=
nd Twister. ran out into a field.

        "Artist, now we need to take car=
e of Dracona's spark." Plintissa said. (Remember, only Artist can hear Plin=
tissa now) Artist headed toward the Maximal base, there Dracona would get a=
 new body, one she could not attack anyone ever again in, and where she can=
 always be helpful. Artist held up the contained, Dracona's spark still ins=
ide.

        "I love you." Artist said seemingly to nobody.

        "I lo=
ve you too." Plintissa said to Artist. Artist continued walking to the Maxi=
mal base...
